description: The OR_LOG_DIAG_CODES table contains OR management system log diagnosis codes.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log of the surgery that the diagnosis refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the diagnosis in the surgical log.

columns.name: DIAGNOSIS_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis attached to the procedure in the log.

columns.name: DIAGNOSIS_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_YN
columns.description:
Yes/No flag indicating whether or not this diagnosis is the primary diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
